## UserWalletEvents interface

[UserWallet](./sdk.userwallet.md) events that you can subscribe to using `sdk.wallet.events`.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface UserWalletEvents
```

## Properties

| Property                                                 | Modifiers | Type                        | Description                                               |
| -------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| [signerChanged](./sdk.userwalletevents.signerchanged.md) |           | \[Signer &#124; undefined\] | Emitted when <code>sdk.wallet.connect()</code> is called. |
